# Team Formation App Duplication Project

## Project Overview
This workspace is for downloading and duplicating the working `team-formation-app-gazi-2` Heroku application. This is a Python Flask web application with Neo4j database integration for scientific team formation algorithms.

## Progress Checklist

- [x] ✅ Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] ✅ Clarify Project Requirements - Download existing Heroku app team-formation-app-gazi-2
- [x] ✅ Scaffold the Project - Clone from Heroku git repository and create duplicate
- [x] ✅ Customize the Project - Create duplicate with updated configurations
- [ ] Install Required Extensions - Python and Flask extensions
- [ ] Compile the Project - Install dependencies and test
- [ ] Create and Run Task - Set up development tasks
- [ ] Launch the Project - Test locally and deploy duplicate
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete - Update README and docs

## Project Details
- **Source**: team-formation-app-gazi-2 (Heroku)
- **Target**: Create working duplicate
- **Tech Stack**: Python Flask, Neo4j, Heroku
- **Algorithms**: 7 scientific team formation algorithms (ACET, CAT, OAT, PRT, COT, TAT, CIT)
